name: nftpets
description:
The hottest new collectible pet trading crypto [cryptid?] currency game from a cyberpunk dystopian future! Mint N.F.T. Pet System Tokens to adopt furbabies, breed and trade them to collect new types, consolidate your assets into your favorite symbol and manipulate the market because why not. With over 3.65 quadrillion (6^20) possible furbabies, adopting them all won’t be easy. Also, YOU CAN PET THEM.

Go to main page: https://nftpets.happyfeels.company
